name: emfundeni-high-school
description: Emfundweni High School Website with Admin Dashboard

scripts.start:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && npx serve -s build -l 3000
scripts.build:prod: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm install --production
scripts.install:all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:backend -- --coverage && npm run test:frontend -- --coverage
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && cd .. && npx firebase deploy --only hosting
